docs: Invoke this tx to initiate funds transfer to the destination chain.
Upon checking basic conditions the contract will burn the `amount` number of `src_token_address` tokens from the caller
and emit an event which is to be picked up & acted on up by the bridge guardians.
messages.label: send_request

docs: Aggregates request votes cast by guardians and mints/burns tokens
messages.label: receive_request

docs: Request payout of rewards for signing & relaying cross-chain transfers.
Can be called by anyone on behalf of the committee member.
messages.label: payout_rewards

docs: Method used to provide the contract with funds for pocket money
messages.label: fund_pocket_money

docs: Upgrades contract code
messages.label: set_code

docs: Query request nonce
Nonce is incremented with every request
messages.label: get_request_nonce

docs: Query pocket money
An amount of the native token that is tranferred with every request
messages.label: get_pocket_money

docs: Query pocket money balance
An amount of the native token that can be used for pocket money transfers
messages.label: get_pocket_money_balance

docs: Returns current active committee id
messages.label: get_current_committee_id

docs: Query total rewards for this committee
Denominated in AZERO
messages.label: get_collected_committee_rewards

docs: Query already paid out committee member rewards
Denominated in AZERO
messages.label: get_paid_out_member_rewards

docs: Query outstanding committee member rewards
The amount that can still be requested.
Denominated in AZERO
Returns an error (reverts) if the `member_id` account is not in the committee with `committee_id`
messages.label: get_outstanding_member_rewards

docs: Queries a gas price oracle and returns the current base_fee charged per cross chain transfer denominated in AZERO
messages.label: get_base_fee

docs: Returns whether an account is in the committee with `committee_id`
messages.label: is_in_committee

docs: Returns an error (reverts) if account is not in the currently active committee
messages.label: only_committee_member

docs: Removes a supported pair from bridging
Can only be called by the contracts owner
messages.label: remove_pair

docs: Adds a supported pair for bridging
Can only be called by the contracts owner
messages.label: add_pair

docs: Sets address of the gas price oracle
Can only be called by the contracts owner
messages.label: set_gas_price_oracle

docs: Change the committee and increase committe id
Can only be called by the contracts owner
Changing the entire set is the ONLY way of upgrading the committee
messages.label: set_committee

docs: Halt/resume the bridge contract
Can only be called by the contracts owner
messages.label: set_halted

docs: Transfer PSP22 tokens from the bridge contract to a given account.
Can only be called by the contracts owner
messages.label: recover_psp22

docs: Transfer AZERO tokens from the bridge contract to a given account.
Can only be called by the contracts owner
messages.label: recover_azero

docs: Is the bridge halted?
messages.label: is_halted

docs: Returns the status of a given cross-chain transfer request
messages.label: request_status
